occi:attribute.name: name
occi:attribute.title: The name of this Container instance

occi:attribute.name: containerid
occi:attribute.title: The ID of this Container instance

occi:attribute.name: image
occi:attribute.title: The image of this Container instance

occi:attribute.name: build
occi:attribute.title: The build directory of this Container instance

occi:attribute.name: command
occi:attribute.title: Override the default command in Dockerfile

occi:attribute.name: ports
occi:attribute.title: The ports of this Container instance

occi:attribute.name: expose
occi:attribute.title: The exposed ports of this Container instance

occi:attribute.name: volumes
occi:attribute.title: The list of volumes

occi:attribute.name: environment
occi:attribute.title: Environment variables

occi:attribute.name: net
occi:attribute.title: 'bridge', 'none', 'container:[name or id]', or 'host'

occi:attribute.name: dns
occi:attribute.title: Custom DNS servers

occi:attribute.name: dns_search
occi:attribute.title: Custom DNS search domains

occi:attribute.name: cap_add
occi:attribute.title: Add container capabilities

occi:attribute.name: cap_drop
occi:attribute.title: Drop container capabilities

occi:attribute.name: working_dir
occi:attribute.title: Working directory

occi:attribute.name: entrypoint
occi:attribute.title: Entry point

occi:attribute.name: memory_swap
occi:attribute.title: Memory swap limit

occi:attribute.name: cpu_shares
occi:attribute.title: CPU shares for this Docker container

occi:attribute.name: pid
occi:attribute.title: '' or 'host'

occi:attribute.name: ipc
occi:attribute.title: '', 'host' or 'container:[name:id]'

occi:attribute.name: publish_all
occi:attribute.title: Publish all exposed ports to random ports on the host interfaces

occi:attribute.name: read_only
occi:attribute.title: Mount the container's root filesystem as read only

occi:attribute.name: monitored
occi:attribute.title: This attribut allow us to monitor the container

occi:attribute.name: cpu_used
occi:attribute.title: CPU consumed by the conatiner

occi:attribute.name: memory_used
occi:attribute.title: Memory consumed by the container

occi:attribute.name: cpu_percent
occi:attribute.title: The percentage of CPU used.

occi:attribute.name: memory_percent
occi:attribute.title: The percentage of Memory used.

occi:attribute.name: disk_used
occi:attribute.title: The disk used.

occi:attribute.name: disk_percent
occi:attribute.title: The percentage of disk used.

occi:attribute.name: bandwidth_used
occi:attribute.title: The bandwidth used by the container.

occi:attribute.name: bandwidth_percent
occi:attribute.title: The percentage of bandwith used.

occi:attribute.name: monitoring_interval
occi:attribute.title: The time interval in which the metrics are retrieved from container. This value is in milliseconds.

occi:attribute.name: cpu_max_value
occi:attribute.title: The CPU max value espression used by the Gauge.

occi:attribute.name: memory_max_value
occi:attribute.title: The memory max value expression used by the gauge.

occi:attribute.name: core_max
occi:attribute.title: The maximum number core availbale on the machine. This value is setting dynamically.

occi:attribute.name: alias
occi:attribute.title: The alias of this Link instance

occi:attribute.name: mode
occi:attribute.title: The mode of this VolumesFrom instance

occi:attribute.name: access_key
occi:attribute.title: Your access key id for the Amazon Web Services API

occi:attribute.name: ami
occi:attribute.title: The AMI ID of the instance to use

occi:attribute.name: instance_type
occi:attribute.title: The instance type to run

occi:attribute.name: region
occi:attribute.title: The region to use when launching the instance

occi:attribute.name: root_size
occi:attribute.title: The root disk size of the instance (in GB)

occi:attribute.name: secret_key
occi:attribute.title: Your secret access key for the Amazon Web Services API

occi:attribute.name: security_group
occi:attribute.title: AWS VPC security group name

occi:attribute.name: session_token
occi:attribute.title: Your session token for the Amazon Web Services API

occi:attribute.name: subnet_id
occi:attribute.title: AWS VPC subnet id

occi:attribute.name: vpc_id
occi:attribute.title: Your VPC ID to launch the instance in

occi:attribute.name: zone
occi:attribute.title: The AWS zone launch the instance in (i.e. one of a,b,c,d,e)

occi:attribute.name: access_token
occi:attribute.title: Your personal access token for the Digital Ocean API

occi:attribute.name: image
occi:attribute.title: The name of the Digital Ocean image to use

occi:attribute.name: region
occi:attribute.title: The region to create the droplet in

occi:attribute.name: size
occi:attribute.title: The size of the Digital Ocean driver (larger than default options are of the form 2gb)

occi:attribute.name: zone
occi:attribute.title: The zone to launch the instance

occi:attribute.name: machine_type
occi:attribute.title: The type of instance

occi:attribute.name: username
occi:attribute.title: The username to use for the instance

occi:attribute.name: instance_name
occi:attribute.title: The name of the instance

occi:attribute.name: project
occi:attribute.title: The name of your project to use when launching the instance

occi:attribute.name: api_endpoint
occi:attribute.title: Change softlayer API endpoint

occi:attribute.name: user
occi:attribute.title: username for your softlayer account, api key needs to match this user

occi:attribute.name: api_key
occi:attribute.title: API key for your user account

occi:attribute.name: cpu
occi:attribute.title: Number of CPU's for the machine

occi:attribute.name: disk_size
occi:attribute.title: Size of the disk in MB. 0 sets the softlayer default

occi:attribute.name: domain
occi:attribute.title: domain name for the machine

occi:attribute.name: hourly_billing
occi:attribute.title: Sets the hourly billing flag (default), otherwise uses monthly billing

occi:attribute.name: image
occi:attribute.title: OS Image to use

occi:attribute.name: local_disk
occi:attribute.title: Use local machine disk instead of softlayer SAN

occi:attribute.name: private_net_only
occi:attribute.title: Disable public networking

occi:attribute.name: region
occi:attribute.title: softlayer region

occi:attribute.name: subscription_id
occi:attribute.title: Your Azure subscription ID (A GUID like d255d8d7-5af0-4f5c-8a3e-1545044b861e)

occi:attribute.name: subscription_cert
occi:attribute.title: Your Azure subscription cert

occi:attribute.name: boot2docker_location
occi:attribute.title: Location of a local boot2docker iso to use. Overrides the URL option below

occi:attribute.name: boot2docker_url
occi:attribute.title: The URL of the boot2docker iso. Defaults to the latest available version

occi:attribute.name: disk_size
occi:attribute.title: Size of disk for the host in MB

occi:attribute.name: virtual_switch
occi:attribute.title: Name of the virtual switch to use. Defaults to first found

occi:attribute.name: flavor_id
occi:attribute.title: The flavor ID to use when creating the machine

occi:attribute.name: image_id
occi:attribute.title: The image ID to use when creating the machine

occi:attribute.name: auth_url
occi:attribute.title: Keystone service base URL

occi:attribute.name: username
occi:attribute.title: User identifer to authenticate with

occi:attribute.name: password
occi:attribute.title: User password. It can be omitted if the standard environment variable OS_PASSWORD is set.

occi:attribute.name: tenant_name
occi:attribute.title: Identify the tenant in which the machine will be created

occi:attribute.name: tenant_id
occi:attribute.title: Identify the tenant in which the machine will be created

occi:attribute.name: region
occi:attribute.title: The region to work on. Can be omitted if there is only one region on the OpenStack

occi:attribute.name: endpoint_type
occi:attribute.title: Endpoint type can be internalURL, adminURL on publicURL. If is a helper for the driver to choose the right URL in the OpenStack service catalog. If not provided the default id publicURL

occi:attribute.name: net_id
occi:attribute.title: The private network id the machine will be connected on. If your OpenStack project project contains only one private network it will be use automatically

occi:attribute.name: sec_groups
occi:attribute.title: If security groups are available on your OpenStack you can specify a comma separated list to use for the machine (e.g. secgrp001,secgrp002)

occi:attribute.name: floatingip_pool
occi:attribute.title: The IP pool that will be used to get a public IP an assign it to the machine. If there is an IP address already allocated but not assigned to any machine, this IP will be chosen and assigned to the machine. If there is no IP address already allocated a new IP will be allocated and assigned to the machine

occi:attribute.name: username
occi:attribute.title: Rackspace account username

occi:attribute.name: api_key
occi:attribute.title: Rackspace API key

occi:attribute.name: region
occi:attribute.title: Rackspace region name

occi:attribute.name: endpoint_type
occi:attribute.title: Rackspace endpoint type (adminURL, internalURL or the default publicURL)

occi:attribute.name: image_id
occi:attribute.title: Rackspace image ID

occi:attribute.name: flavor_id
occi:attribute.title: Rackspace flavor ID

occi:attribute.name: ssh_user
occi:attribute.title: SSH user for the newly booted machine

occi:attribute.name: ssh_port
occi:attribute.title: SSH port for the newly booted machine

occi:attribute.name: boot2docker_url
occi:attribute.title: The URL of the boot2docker image. Default to the latest available version

occi:attribute.name: disk_size
occi:attribute.title: Size of disk for the host in MB

occi:attribute.name: boot2docker_url
occi:attribute.title: URL for boot2docker image

occi:attribute.name: disk_size
occi:attribute.title: Size of disk for host VM (in MB)

occi:attribute.name: memory_size
occi:attribute.title: Size of memory for host VM (in MB)

occi:attribute.name: username
occi:attribute.title: vCloud Air Username

occi:attribute.name: password
occi:attribute.title: vCloud Air Password

occi:attribute.name: catalog
occi:attribute.title: Catalog

occi:attribute.name: catalogitem
occi:attribute.title: Catalog Item

occi:attribute.name: computeid
occi:attribute.title: Compute ID (if using Dedicated Cloud)

occi:attribute.name: cpu_count
occi:attribute.title: VM Cpu Count

occi:attribute.name: docker_port
occi:attribute.title: Docker port

occi:attribute.name: edgegateway
occi:attribute.title: Organization Edge Gateway

occi:attribute.name: memory_size
occi:attribute.title: VM Memory Size in MB

occi:attribute.name: vapp_name
occi:attribute.title: vApp Name

occi:attribute.name: orgvdcnetwork
occi:attribute.title: Organization VDC Network to attach

occi:attribute.name: provision
occi:attribute.title: Install Docker binaries

occi:attribute.name: publicip
occi:attribute.title: Org Public IP to use

occi:attribute.name: ssh_port
occi:attribute.title: SSH port

occi:attribute.name: vdcid
occi:attribute.title: Virtual Data Center ID

occi:attribute.name: username
occi:attribute.title: vSphere Username

occi:attribute.name: password
occi:attribute.title: vSphere Password

occi:attribute.name: boot2docker_url
occi:attribute.title: URL for boot2docker image

occi:attribute.name: compute_ip
occi:attribute.title: Compute host IP where the Docker VM will be instantiated

occi:attribute.name: cpu_count
occi:attribute.title: CPU number for Docker VM

occi:attribute.name: datacenter
occi:attribute.title: Datacenter for Docker VM (must be set to ha-datacenter when connecting to a single host)

occi:attribute.name: datastore
occi:attribute.title: Datastore for Docker VM

occi:attribute.name: disk_size
occi:attribute.title: Size of disk for Docker VM (in MB)

occi:attribute.name: memory_size
occi:attribute.title: Size of memory for Docker VM (in MB)

occi:attribute.name: network
occi:attribute.title: Network where the Docker VM will be attached

occi:attribute.name: pool
occi:attribute.title: Resource pool for Docker VM

occi:attribute.name: vcenter
occi:attribute.title: IP/hostname for vCenter (or ESXi if connecting directly to a single host)
